1.content:
You the adventurer no the glorious adventurer from the land of gilgensherk have traveled far through space and have seen many worlds and many things exploring planets for newfound treasures but a whole new discovery was awaiting you on the last adventure but the first of many others. You had taken an adventure through some abandoned ruins deep in a jungle of a planet light years away from your galaxy exploring the vast ruins with statues of odd creatures and buildings then you came to a large arch as you approach the ground shook and you fell through the ground and disappeared. You wake up finding yourself in pitch black you look around and find several large dark purple swirling portals each with glowing ghostly letters in gold above each portal which read.......

which to enter?
1.title: choices choices choices!

1411.content:
so you set off to the right of the fork to the kingdom of dragons, as you looked in the pitch black distance you see a tiny door at the end of the path and you begin to run for a good 30 minutes before reaching it and take a breath. You opened the door peeking out seeing a massive land, a huge meadow in rolling hills with a tree line to your left and a stream at the base of the trees. A cool breeze was blowing and the sun was out with beautiful clouds. You step out and fall on your face and realize the grass was up to your shins which surprised you, standing up you look behind you and see the door gone. The wind blew hard and knocked you down but as you got up you heard large beating wings and you where blown through the grass as two huge dragons flew by. You rubbed your eyes then stood up seeing them fly over the hill in front of you, curios you run up to the hill and look over the crest seeing a huge medieval kingdom.

The wind blew against you towards the large city and you started to run with it, after an hour of walking and running you reached a road and seeing that the kingdom was still another several miles you decided to wait for a ride. A few more hours past and fortunately for you huge horses with wagons of supplies came through in a group towards the end of the day. You ran up to the edge and grabbed the spoke of a wheel and it lifted you up then you scrambled on top and jumped on the side of the railing and climbed in under the blanket with a thud you landed on big wooden cases the ride was rough but it was faster and more relaxing than walking and running. By the time it was dusk you where there and you peeked out of the front under the blanket and watched the humongous gate lift up and the huge walls on either side, as the wagon rolled in you saw the large muscular dragon guards and soldiers wearing armor and pikes in their hands making merry with one another.

The wagons rolled on through the filthier part of the city and into more posh homes with more wealthy dragons dinning and walking to and fro in fine clothing. after an hour or two the wagons reached their destination you saw the castle as they all turned before the third castle gate leading to what was assumed to be the royal families castle and so on. All the wagons pulled into a large inspection area before a building with supplies in it.

You hopped out quietly and ran up to a barrel hiding and observing as a large lean orange dragon came and inspected the wagons starting with the one you had taken. The drivers all got off they where smaller dragons with clipped wings and chains with the larger fit black dragon in the lead wagon being the slave owner you presumed.

You looked around and saw across the street was a pub then a large food market and way further down you saw the posh homes but as you looked to the right there was the third gate and the huge castle behind it......exploring?
